sentence.Network_en: She silenced them by marrying Mr. Kearney , who was a bootmaker on Ormond Quay.
sentence.Network_cn: 她嫁给了奥尔蒙德码头上的制靴商卡尼先生, 从而堵住了他们的嘴.

auth_sentence.content: In gold-rimmed spectacles, he appeared the archetypal bootmaker.

auth_sentence.content: His boots, fourteen inches high, had been custom-made from the tanned hide of a water buffalo by the bootmaker J.
